New Records: Devon Conway scored 152 not out, his highest ODI score
Rachin Ravindra scored 123 not out, more than double his previous ODI best
Key Match Events: Devon Conway and Rachin Ravindra hit unbeaten centuries
New Zealand won the match by 9 wickets with 13 overs to spare
Pre-Game Insights: Ben Stokes missed the World Cup opener with a hip injury
England's World Cup defence began with a repeat of the 2019 final against New Zealand
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler said England was 'completely outplayed' by New Zealand
Joe Root said England was 'below par in all departments'
Rachin Ravindra said it was 'a little bit unbelievable' to score a century on his World Cup debut
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad
New Zealand's win was their first in a World Cup opener since 2015
The match was a repeat of the 2019 final between England and New Zealand
